title: Don't Starve Together (Cumulative Update to v137410)
description:
== Version:
Cumulative Steam update to v137410 released 5/25/2015, by LuKeStorm 
Required: Any game version from v134235 to v136911
Thanks to LuKeStorm for updating 


== Version changes:
137410 - 5/25/2015
 
Changes
Added a new recipe for Scaled Tiles
The Dragonfly can now drop a Lavae Egg
The Weather PainÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s tornado is less destructive. It now does 2 Ã¢â‚¬Å“workÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ per tick instead of destroying the object outright.
Shadow creatures will now only emit a sanity aura to nearby players that are valid targets.
Birds in Bird Cages now signal their distress when theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re getting hungry.
 
Bug Fixes
Fixed a crash during worldgen on retry
Players should no longer see their previously equipped hat for a couple frames while reviving.
WigfridÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Ã¢â‚¬Å“Refuse EatÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ animation can now be canceled.
WebberÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s spider hiring will ignore spiders that already have a leader.
Heads on a stick now drop the proper amount of loot when they are burnt.
Removed the Ã¢â‚¬Å“ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fullÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ message when putting a bird into a birdcage.
Smallbirds raised in the wild by Tallbirds will no longer starve to death.


== Instructions: 
Start the update and select your game folder to update.
